By: Rand Fishkin February 13, 2006 Readability Indices Design The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Irishwonder pointed me to his blog post on the subject of readability indices. He's referencing a nifty little tool that you can use on your own pages as well as comparing the readability levels of various SEO/M industry blogs (we're ranked 3rd behind SEOBook and Jim Boykin but ahead of Matt Cutts). I'd be interested to see a large scale dissection of high ranking pages across industries and see if patterns crop up in the readability stats and measurements. Copied! Back to Top
